attributes.action: extend voting rights in all UK elections to all members of Her Majesties Armed Services and ensure that all necessary steps are taken to enable all soldiers, sailors and airmen on active duty get to vote in the next General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to the MOD as of 05/11/09 there are 5,119 service personnel are not eligible to vote at the next General Election as they are not British, Commonwealth or Irish Citizens. This includes 4,143 Ghurkhas and 928 service personnel with ‘No Nationality Recorded’.

There are real concerns that due to administrative inadequacies thousands of service personnel on active service round the world will not be able to vote at the next General Election.
